embed.title: Selene
embed.description: A burst hero who provides massive attack increase and damage immunity to friendly troops in the battle opening

fields.name: Active Skill: Moonlight Shackles
fields.value:
• Selene’s <Moonlight Shackles> skill will stun the enemy in the targeted arena and bind them in place for several seconds.
• Range: 5

fields.name: Passive Skill: Moonlight Projection
fields.value:
• At the start of the battle, Selene will give allied units partial damage immunity and increase attack power for a period of time.
Damage immunity applies to all forms of damages, including health steal, reflection, and curse.
• Duration: 3/3/3/4/4/4/5/5/5/6/6/6/7/7/7

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Moonlight Dance
fields.value:
• After several basic attacks, awakened Selene will trigger the <Moonlight Dance> skill to damage enemy units in front of her and reduce their attack.
• Trigger Number: 5/4/3/3/3
• Range: 4×8

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value:
• Magic Apprentice, Undead Soldier, Ballista
• Priest Mage, Peltasts, Taurus Witchers, Pirate Ship
• Witchcraft Totem, Rhino Knight
